title: Support
paragraph1: Describe your issue in detail (fields marked with * are required). If possible, include screenshots, steps to reproduce the bug, and browser or device information
paragraph2: We do monitor your reports and messages daily to improve the user experience for all skilletons!
subject: Subject
autocomplete1: Portfolio Builder is not working properly 🙁
autocomplete2: Premium features are not available for some reason 👑

autocomplete4: I would like to propose a collaboration 🤝
